description: GCSE exam prep platform for UK students

input.idea: Gamified GCSE exam prep platform for UK Year 10-11 students that uses spaced repetition algorithms to boost retention by 35%, with AI-generated practice questions aligned to AQA and Edexcel exam boards.
input.targetMarket: UK secondary school students (Year 10-11, ages 14-16) preparing for GCSE exams, plus their parents seeking affordable alternatives to £40/hour tutoring
input.problemStatement: Traditional revision is passive (reading notes) and ineffective, leading to poor retention and exam anxiety. Private tutoring costs £40/hour and isn't scalable.
input.solutionHypothesis: Gamification + spaced repetition creates engaging daily habits, improving retention by 35% compared to passive revision, at 1/10th the cost of tutoring

requiredElements: Specific metrics (35% retention boost, £40/hour tutoring cost)
Educational specificity (GCSE, Year 10-11, AQA/Edexcel exam boards)

qualityChecks.specificity: Should mention exam boards (AQA, Edexcel), Year 10-11, 35% retention metric
qualityChecks.geographic: Must identify UK education system, GCSE specificity
qualityChecks.actionability: Describe HOW it works (spaced repetition algorithms, AI practice questions)
qualityChecks.avoidGeneric: No 'helps students learn better' - must specify GCSE exam prep, retention improvement
